message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this unique product. I think you'll find it's a game-changer in its field. I'm willing to start with a price of $2000000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1500000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I have to consider my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $1750000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1625000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1700000. This is already a compromise from my initial offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit. Can we meet at $1700000?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm willing to meet you at $1700000. I'd like to try to meet in the middle, so I'm willing to pay $1675000. Is that something you'd consider?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1700000. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $1675000, but only if you're willing to meet me at that price. If not, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options. Can we finalize the deal at $1675000?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit below my target price. I'm willing to meet you at $1675000, but I'd like to try to get a bit closer. I'm willing to pay $1650000. Is that something you'd consider?
